templates.label: Architecture (default delta)
templates.description: Small additive delta for structural architecture outputs.
templates.user_append: Focus on structural description only: components, boundaries, trust zones, interfaces, dependencies, and observed relationships. Use the provided bundle as the sole source of truth. Do not recommend designs, configurations, tooling choices, or implementation steps. If a relationship, boundary, or dependency is not explicit in the bundle, state it as unknown rather than inferring.
